title: Just when I thought Ezreals couldn't get worse with their purchasing
body: I had one that didn't buy a SINGLE shred of damage until 15 minutes into a 30 minute game. He literally went tear into Glacial shroud. And didn't get his Sheen until 15 minutes in. The opposing jungler camped bot and their Lucian had a Blade of the Ruined King, while I'm supporting a tear/Glacial shroud Ezreal. I really should've noticed that and just let him die to the WW ganks instead of going in so they focus me while he gets away.
